proofNotes: The evidence provided is limited to a single statement.
Proof verifier checks evidenceQuotes against the Capability Brief text (normalized matching; ellipsis wildcard supported).
The "Evidence mismatch" flag is verifier-owned and is only added/removed by the proof verifier.
Proof totals count unpaired evidence IDs (IDs without quotes) as unverified references (conservative scoring).

requirements.text: The system shall address the requirements of the test rfp.
requirements.responseSummary: The capability brief indicates a 'test cap' which partially addresses the 'test rfp' requirement.
gapsOrQuestions: What specific features are included in 'test cap'?
How does 'test cap' specifically satisfy 'test rfp'?

proposalOutline.executiveSummary: This proposal outlines how our 'test cap' capability aligns with the 'test rfp' requirements.
evidenceVerificationNotes: Verification based strictly on provided capability brief.
